description:
Tasty blend of organic and vegan ingredients that will help you perform at your best. Krono Nutrition sports drinks focus on replacing the electrolytes and water you lose while sweating.

  • Ingredients: organic cane sugar, organic dextrose, malic acid, organic lemon powder (organic rice maltodextrin, organic lemon juice concentrate, organic lemon oil), sea salt, organic lime powder (organic lime juice concentrate and organic maltodextrin), organic stevia extract, magnesium oxide extracted from sea water, and organic natural flavour
  • Allergens: may contain tree nuts
  • Carbohydrates help replenish the energy used while pushing yourself
  • Balance of cane sugar and dextrose increases your body’s ability to absorb and use carbohydrates
  • Sodium, magnesium, and potassium replace lost salts and minerals
name: Krono Nutrition Sport Drink Mix Lemon and Lime
